001package org.relationlearn.model;
002
003import java.util.List;
004
005/**
006 * The ArgumentNode interface represents a text message in a given message 
007 * board with additional parameters to help it being identified from other
008 * messages in a RelationDigraph instace.
009 * 
010 * @see RelationDigraph
011 * @see ArgumentRelation
012 */
013public interface ArgumentNode {
014    
015    /**
016     * Returns the ArgumentNode identifier.
017     * 
018     * @return this ArgumentNode identifier
019     */
020    public int getNodeId();
021    
022    /**
023     * Returns the weight value of this ArgumentNode.
024     * 
025     * <p>
026     * <b>Note: </b>Negative weight values should be permited by 
027     * ArgumentNode implementations.
028     * </p>
029     * 
030     * @return the weight of this ArgumentNode
031     */
032    public int getNodeWeight();
033    
034    /**
035     * Adds an ArgumentRelation which represents the reply this node
036     * made to antoher ArgumentNode.
037     * 
038     * @param aRel the ArgumentRelation that contains this node as origin and
039     * another ArgumentNode as destination.
040     */
041    public void addTargetRelation(ArgumentRelation aRel);
042    
043    /**
044     * Returns the ArgumentRelation in which this node is the origin.
045     * 
046     * @return the ArgumentRelation that has its source in this
047     * ArgumentNode object.
048     * 
049     * @see ArgumentRelation
050     */
051    public ArgumentRelation getTargetRelation();
052    
053    /**
054     * Returns the ArgumentRelation with id {@code relationId} in which
055     * this node is the destination.
056     * 
057     * @param relationId the id of the ArgumentRelation
058     * @return the ArgumentRelation in which this node acts as the destination.
059     */
060    public ArgumentRelation getReplayRelation(int relationId);
061    
062    /**
063     * Returns a List of all the ArgumentRelation objects in which this node
064     * acts as the destination.
065     * 
066     * @return a list containing all the ArgumentRelations in which this node
067     * is the destination.
068     */
069    public List<ArgumentRelation> getReplyRelations();
070    
071    /**
072     * Adds a new ArgumentRelation in which this node acts as the destination.
073     * 
074     * @param relation the ArgumentRelation to be added
075     * 
076     * @see ArgumentRelation
077     */
078    public void addReplyRelation(ArgumentRelation relation);
079    
080    /**
081     * Returns the text that this node contains.
082     * 
083     * @return the text this node contains
084     */
085    public String getArgumentNodeText(); 
086}
